nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStats_enable
nml_option.description: If true, landice analysis member regionalStats is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStats_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computations should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStats_stream_name
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the regionalStats analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStats_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if analysis member computations occur on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStats_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

package.name: regionalStatsAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the regionalStats analysis member.

var.name: regionalIceArea
var.description: total ice sheet area within region

var.name: regionalIceVolume
var.description: total ice sheet volume within region

var.name: regionalVolumeAboveFloatation
var.description: total ice sheet volume above floatation

var.name: regionalGroundedIceArea
var.description: total grounded ice sheet area within region

var.name: regionalGroundedIceVolume
var.description: total grounded ice sheet volume within region

var.name: regionalFloatingIceArea
var.description: total floating ice sheet area within region

var.name: regionalFloatingIceVolume
var.description: total floating ice sheet volume within region

var.name: regionalIceThicknessMin
var.description: min ice thickness within region

var.name: regionalIceThicknessMax
var.description: max ice thickness within region

var.name: regionalIceThicknessMean
var.description: mean ice thickness within region

var.name: regionalSumSfcMassBal
var.description: area-integrated surface mass balance within region

var.name: regionalSumGroundedSfcMassBal
var.description: area-integrated surface mass balance on grounded ice within region

var.name: regionalSumFloatingSfcMassBal
var.description: area-integrated surface mass balance on floating ice within region

var.name: regionalAvgNetAccumulation
var.description: average sfcMassBal, as a thickness rate. Positive values represent ice gain.

var.name: regionalSumBasalMassBal
var.description: area-integrated basal mass balance within region

var.name: regionalSumGroundedBasalMassBal
var.description: total, area integrated grounded basal mass balance. Positive values represent ice gain.

var.name: regionalAvgGroundedBasalMelt
var.description: average groundedBasalMassBal value, as a thickness rate. Positive values represent ice loss.

var.name: regionalSumFloatingBasalMassBal
var.description: total, area integrated floating basal mass balance. Positive values represent ice gain.

var.name: regionalAvgSubshelfMelt
var.description: average floatingBasalMassBal value, as a thickness rate. Positive values represent ice loss.

var.name: regionalSumCalvingFlux
var.description: area-integrated calving flux within region

var.name: regionalSumFaceMeltingFlux
var.description: area-integrated face-melting flux within region

var.name: regionalSumGroundingLineFlux
var.description: total mass flux across all grounding lines (note that flux from floating to grounded ice makes a negative contribution to this metric)

var.name: regionalSumGroundingLineMigrationFlux
var.description: total mass flux due to migration of the grounding line. Positive is grounded to floating.

var.name: regionalSurfaceSpeedMax
var.description: maximum surface speed in the domain

var.name: regionalBasalSpeedMax
var.description: maximum basal speed in the domain
